评论概述: Good looking watch,  worth the price.. except for the band...
评论详情: Pleasantly surprised at how well this looks and feels. From a distance people would think it's a RLX GMT Master. It is just a bit on the light weight side, (about 2/3rds the weight of it's inspiration) and the rotating bezel has just a tad of extra play to it... but hell for under $200 I'd by happy... except for the band. I was excited as this could have been my go to daily for running around...then I took off the massive amount of shrink wrap around the bracelet.. and the band literley came apart!!!  2 pins near the clasp just fell out with the wrap and the bracelet came apart! I'm sure I could have grabbed my tools or taken it somewhere to be put it back together.. but regardless of price. If something falls apart or breaks when you unwrap it.. it's not worth keeping in my opinion.  I may give this company another chance down the road but for now this is getting returned.

评论概述: Great watch keesp time accurate. GMT hand is accurate
类型: Color: Golden white Full Black GMT
评论详情: Changing my review from 2* to 5*. I had it 2* because i thought the GMT hand was not accurate. Turns out i was setting it incorrectly. Once i was shown the proper way to set the GMT hand this watch is very accurate.

Keeps great time and looks even better. My favorite watch to wear. Perfect size and weight for me. If you want an authentic Rolex Batman but don’t want to dish out a crazy amount of cash, this my friend will fulfill your wishes at a mere fraction of the cost. Don’t hesitate, pick one up. My only drawback that didn’t give five stars is that I wish they used crystal sapphire instead of their synthetic sapphire but at this price it’s still a stunning watch that I haven’t taken off yet, day or night.
